de.eckhartarnold.client

Class Gallery

  • java.lang.Object
    • Composite
      • de.eckhartarnold.client.GalleryBase
        • de.eckhartarnold.client.GalleryWidget
          • de.eckhartarnold.client.Gallery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResizeListener

    public class Gallery
extends GalleryWidget
    Implements the full gallery widget.

    Class Gallery is an extension to class GalleryWidget that adds a title, a sub title and a bottom line and also a button to start a slide show.

    Author:
    ecki

               int edgeWidth,
               int edgeHeight,
               int hpadding,

        A more verbose constructor of class Gallery
        Parameters:
        collection - the image collection info from which to construct the gallery
        edgeWidth - the width of the thumbnail images
        edgeHeight - the height of the thumbnail images
        hpadding - the horizontal padding between the thumbnail images
        vpadding - the vertical padding between the thumbnail images
